column4: question:  is it possible for me to run two mice off an ubuntu pc and have two mouse pointers on my desktop?
patrick it may be wise to boot off a recovery disk
if I boot from the Ubuntu CD, can this one fix my system?

no it aint that bad, I run in the graphic mode right now. the fsck did the job alright. But I would need some kind of diagnose tool to update the things which might be corrupt at the moment. some sectors and files, indexes were cleared and fixed, so i guess it would be nice if i could start a process which checked every installed package, or if I could just fix the package manager, that would be enough to start with.
